titleStmt.title: A treaty of pacification. Or Conditions of peace between God and man. / By H.I.
titleStmt.author: Isaacson, Henry, 1581-1654.
Marshall, William, fl. 1617-1650, engraver.

notesStmt.note: The title page is engraved and signed: W.M. sculp:, i.e. William Marshall.
Running title reads: A treaty of pacification between God and man.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
